front.title: Some Thoughts on the Importance of Modesty and Decorum and an IETF Code of Conduct

abstract.t: Because of the importance of the work done in the IETF, and because of the broad cultural diversity of the participants, some of whom find our most-unrestrained "style" of interaction rather foreign and uncomfortable, I believe the time has come for the IETF to adopt a Code of Conduct to govern our interactions.
